content: <ce:para view="all">All chemicals were of reagent grade quality obtained from commercial sources and used without further purification. A mixture of Eu<ce:inf loc="post">2</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf> (0.3<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol, 0.568<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g), Ag(NO<ce:inf loc="post">3</ce:inf>) (0.3<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol, 0.0510<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g), 4,5-imidazoledicarboxylic acid (0.3<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mmol, 0.357<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>g) and water (12<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL) was stirred for 30<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>min in air. Thereafter, the mixture was transferred to a 23<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>mL Teflon reactor and kept at 180<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C for 3 days under autogenous pressure. Cooling the reactor subsequently to room temperature at a rate of 10.8<ce:hsp sp="0.25"></ce:hsp>°C/h colorless crystals of <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> were obtained. Finally, the colorless crystals were washed with deionized water and absolute ethanol (yield: 45% based on Eu). IR: 3441(w), 1554(s), 1508(s), 1465(s), 1383(s), 1244(m), 1100(m), 818(s), 782(s). Anal. Calcd. for C<ce:inf loc="post">10</ce:inf>H<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>N<ce:inf loc="post">4</ce:inf>O<ce:inf loc="post">8</ce:inf> EuAg(%), C, 21.15; H, 0.71; N, 9.86. Found (%): C, 21.13; H, 0.71; N, 9.89.</ce:para>
clean_text: All chemicals were of reagent grade quality obtained from commercial sources and used without further purification. A mixture of Eu2O3 (0.3mmol, 0.568g), Ag(NO3) (0.3mmol, 0.0510g), 4,5-imidazoledicarboxylic acid (0.3mmol, 0.357g) and water (12mL) was stirred for 30min in air. Thereafter, the mixture was transferred to a 23mL Teflon reactor and kept at 180°C for 3 days under autogenous pressure. Cooling the reactor subsequently to room temperature at a rate of 10.8°C/h colorless crystals of 1 were obtained. Finally, the colorless crystals were washed with deionized water and absolute ethanol (yield: 45% based on Eu). IR: 3441(w), 1554(s), 1508(s), 1465(s), 1383(s), 1244(m), 1100(m), 818(s), 782(s). Anal. Calcd. for C10H4N4O8 EuAg(%), C, 21.15; H, 0.71; N, 9.86. Found (%): C, 21.13; H, 0.71; N, 9.89.
